Description (kr): 체력 절반 이하 상태에서 보스 클리어
Description (en): Kill the boss with less than half the health
Try to die in sand swamp.
Break the box in the shop.

Description (kr): 마지막 보스 체력 절반 이하에서 패배
Description (en): if you lose when the boss has less than half health, you get this medal.
You hit the bullet with the sword.
Use the healing skill when you have only less than half health.
You get this medal when you can't use the double jump properly.
